title: Tarzan of the Apes, Three Complete Novels: Tarzan of the Apes / The Son of Tarzan / Tarzan at the Earth's Core
description: 1 Tarzan of the Apes Tarzan orphaned babe in Africa adopted by ape, grows strong, loses love2 The Son of Tarzan Jack flees to Africa with ape Akut, grows strong, finds love3 Tarzan at the Earth's Core Tarzan leads expedition by dirigible to Pellucidar. Jason Gridley wants to rescue Emperor David from Kosaks.
author: Edgar Rice Burroughs
